explains: n. 苏丹（某些伊斯兰国家统治者的称号）

sentences.en: The first comer was the sultan himself.
sentences.cn: 第一位来人是苏丹本人。

sentences.en: The sultan was still nominally the chief of staff.
sentences.cn: 苏丹在名义上仍是军队领导人。

sentences.en: "No," said the Sultan, "I will be true to my master."
sentences.cn: “不，”苏丹说，“我要忠于我的主人。”
